message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product for $20000. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value item that will bring significant benefits to you. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

I understand you're looking for a fair price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $16000. This is a compromise that should be beneficial to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget constraints.

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go below $17000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'm offering the product to you for $16500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a great value for the product.
